snippet: “Marco’s my friend. I admire him greatly. He is a gifted politician for sure, but I think we need to focus on who can lead, who can forge consensus, who can solve problems.” — Jeb Bush
abstract: “Marco’s my friend. I admire him greatly. He is a gifted politician for sure, but I think we need to focus on who can lead, who can forge consensus, who can solve problems.” — Jeb Bush

headline.main: Verbatim: Jeb Bush on Marco Rubio — ‘We Need to Focus on Who Can Lead’
